content: As an AI language model, I cannot feel emotions like a human being would, but I understand your frustration. It is understandable that you feel that companies involved in the scandal should have faced some legal consequences for their unethical behavior. However, at the time of the Quiz Show Scandal, there were no specific laws or regulations in place to address such issues. As a result, the companies involved faced a backlash from the public, which led to the creation of strict regulations to ensure the integrity of quiz shows and other television programs in the future.
